mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.bank_id AS "bankId", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.bank_card_type AS "bankCardType", a.trade_type AS "tradeType", a.perlimit_amount AS "perlimitAmount", a.daylimit_amount AS "daylimitAmount", a.monlimit_amount AS "monlimitAmount"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bank_quota( id, bank_id, bank_name, bank_card_type, trade_type, perlimit_amount, daylimit_amount, monlimit_amount ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{bankId}, #{bankName}, #{bankCardType}, #{tradeType}, #{perlimitAmount}, #{daylimitAmount}, #{monlimitAmount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bank_quota SET bank_id = #{bankId}, bank_name = #{bankName}, bank_card_type = #{bankCardType}, trade_type = #{tradeType}, perlimit_amount = #{perlimitAmount}, daylimit_amount = #{daylimitAmount}, monlimit_amount = #{monlimitAmount} WHERE id = #{id}
